attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement to hold a licence to own a dog of any breed.
attributes.additional_details:
Each individual should then be vetted to make sure their Current lifestyle is suited for the dog of their choice. 

This I believe will reduce the amount of bad breeding, dog fighting and the re-homing of animals throughout the UK. As people will only be able to get a dog that is suited to their lifestyle. Instead of getting a dog and trying to mould it to fit in with their lifestyle.
attributes.background:
Instead of banning numerous dog breeds throughout the UK. 

Make it a legal requirement for anyone who is breeding, buying or selling a dog to hold a license.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/643650
Bring back a Dog Licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643631
Introduce screening process for dog owners
